title: He's Too Good for NewsJack" - BBC""He's Too Good for NewsJack" - BBC""e's To"
text: In a shock revelation, satirical radio sketch show 'NewsJack' have confirmed the real reason why none of Sam Lake's piercing, witty one-liners have made it to broadcast is because he is 'too good for NewsJack'. Speaking out load near a turkish kebab van, Head of BBC Comedy Keith Chegwin said 'We know our place in the world. Sam's jokes about the greek economy make Ian Hislop look like an old senile grandfather shitting himself in a rusty wheelchair.' Sam Lake has yet to comment.
